refbody.section: PurposeSpecifies whether disk persistence is enabled or disabled on a virtual or a physical appliance.

dlentry.dd: Specifies whether disk persistence is enabled or disabled on a virtual or a physical appliance.
The default value for a virtual appliance is True.
The default value for a physical appliance is False.

ul.li: The command must be capitalized as shown.

refbody.section: ExampleSets the disk persistence on a virtual appliance to False: imaserver set EnableDiskPersistence=False The requested configuration change has completed successfully.
